```{r}

df <- (data.frame(iso_delay_untraced_sd_max = params$iso_delay_untraced_sd_max,p.trace_app = params$p.trace_app,Rt_Q_05=params$Rt_Q_05,Rt_Q_25= params$Rt_Q_25,Rt_Q_50=params$Rt_Q_50,Rt_Q_75=params$Rt_Q_75,Rt_Q_95=params$Rt_Q_95))
RtBasedonAppTraceForReport(df,"Rt")

db <- (data.frame(iso_delay_untraced_sd_max = params$iso_delay_untraced_sd_max,p.trace_app = params$p.trace_app,n.active_Q_05=params$n.active_Q_05,n.active_Q_25= params$n.active_Q_25,n.active_Q_50=params$n.active_Q_50,n.active_Q_75=params$n.active_Q_75,n.active_Q_95=params$n.active_Q_95))
RtBasedonAppTraceForReport(db,"n.active")

dc <- (data.frame(iso_delay_untraced_sd_max = params$iso_delay_untraced_sd_max,p.trace_app = params$p.trace_app,n.new_Q_05=params$n.new_Q_05,n.new_Q_25= params$n.new_Q_25,n.new_Q_50=params$n.new_Q_50,n.new_Q_75=params$n.new_Q_75,n.new_Q_95=params$n.new_Q_95))
RtBasedonAppTraceForReport(dc,"n.new")

dm <- (data.frame(iso_delay_untraced_sd_max = params$iso_delay_untraced_sd_max,p.trace_app = params$p.trace_app,n.total_Q_05=params$n.total_Q_05,n.total_Q_25= params$n.total_Q_25,n.total_Q_50=params$n.total_Q_50,n.total_Q_75=params$n.total_Q_75,n.total_Q_95=params$n.total_Q_95))
RtBasedonAppTraceForReport(dm,"n.total")

dn <- (data.frame(iso_delay_untraced_sd_max = params$iso_delay_untraced_sd_max,p.trace_app = params$p.trace_app,n.iso_Q_05=params$n.iso_Q_05,n.iso_Q_25= params$n.iso_Q_25,n.iso_Q_50=params$n.iso_Q_50,n.iso_Q_75=params$n.iso_Q_75,n.iso_Q_95=params$n.iso_Q_95))
RtBasedonAppTraceForReport(dn,"n.iso")

dt <- data.frame(titles = params$titles,
                 value = params$values) 
library(knitr)                           
kable(dt)
```
